nodes.text: The Sadow escarpment was an escarpment on the Unknown Regions planet Exegol, an ancient Sith redoubt covered in barren rock and desert flats. The escarpment shared its name with the ancient Sith Lord Naga Sadow.
The Sadow escarpment was introduced in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
